【解析】
方法一：  $\lim_{n\to \infty}n[(\ln (2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2] = \lim_{n\to \infty}n\ln (1 + \frac{1}{2n})$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \ln (1 + \frac {1}{2 n}) ^ {n} \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \ln [ (1 + \frac {1}{2 n}) ^ {2 n} ] ^ {\frac {1}{2}} \\ = \ln e ^ {\frac {1}{2}} \\ = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$
方法二：  $\lim_{n\to \infty}n\left\{(\ln (2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2\right\} = \lim_{n\to \infty}\frac{\ln(2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2}{\frac{1}{n}}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = (\ln x) ^ {\prime} \Big | _ {x = 2} \\ = \left. \frac {1}{x} \right| _ {x = 2} = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$
方法三：  $\lim_{n\to \infty}n\left\{(\ln (2 + \frac{1}{n}) - \ln 2\right\} = \lim_{n\to \infty}x\left\{\ln (2 + \frac{1}{x}) - \ln 2\right\}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \lim  _ {n \to \infty} \frac {\ln (2 + \frac {1}{x}) - \ln 2}{\frac {1}{x}} \\ \frac {1}{(2 + \frac {1}{-})} \cdot \left(- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}\right) \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {x}{- \frac {1}{x ^ {2}}} \\ = \lim  _ {n \rightarrow \infty} \frac {1}{2 + \frac {1}{x}} \\ = \frac {1}{2} \\ \end{array}
$$
(说明:不转换成函数极限, 直接用洛必达法则计算可以不扣分)

【解析】方法一：  $\int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{x(1 - x)}} = 2\int \frac{1}{\sqrt{1 - x}} d\sqrt{x}$
$$
= 2 \arcsin \sqrt {x} + c
$$
方法二：  $\int \frac{dx}{\sqrt{x(1 - x)}} = \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{x - x^2}} dx = \int \frac{1}{\sqrt{\frac{1}{4} - (x - \frac{1}{2})^2}} d(x - \frac{1}{2})$
$$
= \arcsin (2 x - 1) + c
$$
方法三：设  $\sqrt{x} = t$  ，则  $x = t^{2}$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \int \frac {d x}{\sqrt {x (1 - x)}} = \int \frac {1}{t \sqrt {1 - t ^ {2}}} 2 t d t \\ = 2 \int \frac {1}{\sqrt {1 - t ^ {2}}} d t = 2 \arcsin t + c \\ = 2 \arcsin \sqrt {x} + c \\ \end{array}
$$

【解析】  $\because \left[\sin^2\left(\frac{1}{x}\right)\right]' = 2\sin \frac{1}{x} \cdot \cos \frac{1}{x} \cdot \left(-\frac{1}{x^2}\right) = -\frac{1}{x^2}\sin \frac{2}{x}$
$$
\because (2 ^ {x}) ^ {\prime} = 2 ^ {x} \ln 2,
$$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = \left[ \sin^ {2} \left(\frac {1}{x}\right) - 2 ^ {x} \right] ^ {\prime} = \left[ \sin^ {2} \left(\frac {1}{x}\right) \right] ^ {\prime} - \left(2 ^ {x}\right) ^ {\prime} \\ = - \frac {1}{x ^ {2}} \sin \frac {2}{x} - 2 ^ {x} \ln 2 \\ \end{array}
$$

【解析】方法一：将方程  $e^{y} = \sqrt{x^{2} + y^{2}}$  两边对  $x$  求导数得
$$
e ^ {y} y ^ {\prime} = \frac {2 x + 2 y y ^ {\prime}}{2 \sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}} ,
$$
则  $y^\prime (e^y\sqrt{x^2 + y^2} -y) = x$
$$
\begin{array}{l} \therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = y ^ {\prime} = \frac {x}{e ^ {y} \sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} - y} = \frac {x}{e ^ {2 y} - y} \\ \therefore \frac{dy}{dx}\bigg|_{\substack{y = 0\\ x = 1}} = 1 \\ \end{array}
$$
方法二：将方程  $e^{y} = \sqrt{x^{2} + y^{2}}$  两边取自然对数得
$$
\begin{array}{l} y = \frac {1}{2} \ln \left(x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}\right) \\ \therefore y ^ {\prime} = \frac {1}{2} \cdot \frac {2 x + 2 y y ^ {\prime}}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} \\ \end{array}
$$
则  $y^\prime (x^2 +y^2 -y) = x$
$$
\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = y ^ {\prime} = \frac {x}{x ^ {2} + y ^ {2} - y} = \frac {x}{e ^ {2 y} - y}
$$
$$
\therefore \frac{dy}{dx}\bigg|_{\substack{y = 0\\ x = 1}} = 1
$$
方法三：设  $F(x,y) = e^{y} - \sqrt{x^2 + y^2}$
则，  $F_{x}^{\prime} = -\frac{2x}{2\sqrt{x^{2} + y^{2}}} = -\frac{x}{\sqrt{x^{2} + y^{2}}}$
$$
F _ {x} ^ {\prime} = e ^ {y} - \frac {2 y}{2 \sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}} = e ^ {y} - \frac {y}{\sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}},
$$
$$
\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} = - \frac {F _ {x} ^ {\prime}}{F _ {y} ^ {\prime}} = - \frac {- \frac {x}{\sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}}}{e ^ {y} - \frac {y}{\sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}}}} = \frac {x}{e ^ {y} \sqrt {x ^ {2} + y ^ {2}} - y} = \frac {x}{e ^ {2 y} - y}
$$
$$
\therefore \frac {d y}{d x} \Bigg | _ {\substack {y = 0 \\ x = 1}} = 1.
$$

【解析】  $\int_0^1\ln (\sqrt{1 + x^2} +x)dx = x\ln (\sqrt{1 + x^2} +x)\left|\frac{1}{0} -\int_0^1xd\left[\ln (\sqrt{1 + x^2} +x)\right.\right|$
$$
\begin{array}{l} = \ln (\sqrt {2} + 1) - \int_ {0} ^ {1} \frac {x}{\sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}}} d x \\ = \ln (\sqrt {2} + 1) - \sqrt {1 + x ^ {2}} \left| _ {0} ^ {1} \right. \\ = \ln (\sqrt {2} + 1) - \sqrt {2} + 1. \\ \end{array}

方法一：  $\mathrm{D} = \left\{(x,y)\bigg|x^2 +y^2\leq 1,x\geq 0\right\}$  如右图所示：
$$
\begin{array}{l} \iint_ {D} x y ^ {2} d \sigma = \iint_ {D} x y ^ {2} d x d y = \int_ {- 1} ^ {1} d y \int_ {0} ^ {\sqrt {1 - y ^ {2}}} x y ^ {2} d x \\ = \int_ {- 1} ^ {1} \left(\frac {1}{2} x ^ {2} y ^ {2} \right| _ {0} ^ {\sqrt {1 - y ^ {2}}}) d y \\ = \frac {1}{2} \int_ {- 1} ^ {1} \left(1 - y ^ {2}\right) y ^ {2} d y = \frac {1}{2} \left(\frac {y ^ {3}}{3} - \frac {y ^ {5}}{5}\right) \Big | _ {-} ^ {1} \\ = \frac {1}{3} - \frac {1}{5} = \frac {2}{1 5}. \\ \end{array}
$$
方法二：  $D = \left\{(x,y)\bigg|x^2 +y^2\leq 1,x\geq 0\right\}$  如右图所示
$$
\begin{array}{l} \iint_ {D} x y ^ {2} d \sigma = \int_ {- \frac {\pi}{2}} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} d \theta \int_ {0} ^ {1} r ^ {4} \cos \theta d r \\ = \frac {1}{5} \gamma^ {5} \left| _ {0} ^ {1} \int_ {- \frac {\pi}{2}} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} \cos^ {2} \theta \sin \theta d \theta \right. \\ = \frac {1}{5} \int_ {- \frac {\pi}{2}} ^ {\frac {\pi}{2}} r ^ {4} \cos \theta \sin^ {2} \theta d \theta \\ = \frac {1}{5} \cdot \frac {1}{3} \sin^ {3} \theta \left| \begin{array}{c} \frac {\pi}{2} \\ - \frac {\pi}{2} \end{array} \right. \\ = \frac {2}{1 5} \\ \end{array}
$$

$$

【解析】（1） $\because f'(x) = g(x) = 5x^4 - 20x^3 + 15x^2,$ $$ \therefore f (x) = \int \left(5 x ^ {4} - 2 0 x ^ {3} + 1 5 x ^ {2}\right) d x = x ^ {5} - 5 x ^ {4} + 5 x ^ {3} + c. $$ $$ \because f (0) = 0 \Rightarrow c = 0, $$ $$ \therefore f (x) = x ^ {5} - 5 x ^ {4} + 5 x ^ {3}. $$ (2) $\because f^{\prime}(x) = g(x) = 5x^{4} - 20x^{3} + 15x^{2}(x - 3)(x - 1)$ , 令 $f'(x) = 0$ ，解得 $x = 0, x = 1, x = 3$ 列函数性态表如下
x(-∞,0)0(0,1)1(1,3)3(3,+∞)
y'+0+0-0+
y↗无极值↗极大值↘极小值↗
(说明: 不列表, 分别讨论单调性不扣分) 故 $f(x)$ 在区间 $(- \infty, 1)$ 及 $(3, + \infty)$ 单调上升，在区间 $(1, 3)$ 单调下降； $f(x)$ 的极大值 $f(1) = 1$ ，极小值 $f(3) = -27$ 。 （3）方法一： $\lim_{x\to 0}\frac{\int_0^x\sin^4tdt}{f(x)} = \lim_{x\to 0}\frac{\sin^4x}{f'(x)}$ $$ \begin{array}{l} = \lim _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\sin^ {4} x}{5 x ^ {4} - 2 0 x ^ {3} + 1 5 x ^ {2}} \\ = \lim _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\sin^ {4} x}{x ^ {4}} \cdot \frac {x ^ {2}}{5 x ^ {2} - 2 0 x + 1 5} \\ = 0. \\ \end{array} $$ 方法二： $\lim_{x\to 0}\frac{\int_{0}^{x}\sin^{4}t dt}{f(x)} = \lim_{x\to 0}\frac{\sin^{4}x}{f'(x)}$ $$ \begin{array}{l} = \lim _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {\sin^ {4} x}{5 x ^ {4} - 2 0 x ^ {3} + 1 5 x ^ {2}} \\ = \lim _ {x \rightarrow 0} \frac {x ^ {2}}{5 x ^ {2} - 2 0 x + 1 5} \\ = 0. \\ \end{array} $$

证明：设  $F(x) = f^{2}(x) - g^{2}(x)$ ，
则  $F^{\prime}(x) = 2f(x)f^{\prime}(x) - 2g(x)g^{\prime}(x)$  。
$$
\begin{array}{l} \because f ^ {\prime} (x) = g (x), g ^ {\prime} (x) = f (x) \\ \therefore F ^ {\prime} (x) = 2 f (x) g (x) - 2 g (x) f (x) = 0. \\ \end{array}
$$
故  $F(x) = f^{2}(x) - g^{2}(x) = C$  ，  $C$  为常数。
又  $\because f(0) = 1, g(0) = 0,$
$$
\therefore C = 1 \Rightarrow f ^ {2} (x) - g ^ {2} (x) = 1, x \in (- \infty , + \infty) 。
$$
